name: Data on the Web Best Practices Working Group
description: The mission of the Data on the Web Best Practices  Working Group is (1) to develop the open data ecosystem, facilitating  better communication between developers and publishers; (2) to provide  guidance to publishers that will improve consistency in the way data is  managed, thus promoting the re-use of data; (3) to foster trust in the  data among developers, whatever technology they choose to use,  increasing the potential for genuine innovation.
